item.title: 哈比卜银行首席执行官被任命为巴基斯坦新任财政部长
item.description: 巴基斯坦任命哈比卜银行（Habib Bank Ltd.）首席执行官为新任财政部长，以帮助巴基斯坦在一场有争议的选举后扶持资金短缺的经济。【原文：Pakistan appointed Habib Bank Ltd.’s chief executive officer as its new finance minister to help bolster the cash-strapped economy after a contentious election.】

item.title: 美联储终止支持美国银行的工具，使储备金成为关注焦点
item.description: 随着帮助解决去年地区银行危机的紧急贷款工具到期，华尔街银行正在寻找其他方法来充实自己的资金。【原文：Wall Street banks are hunting for alternative ways to shore up their coffers as an emergency lending tool that helped resolve last year’s regional banking crisis expires.】

item.title: 雷蒙德-詹姆斯（Raymond James）从花旗银行收盘小额债券部聘用 10 名员工
item.description: 雷蒙德-詹姆斯金融公司（Raymond James Financial Inc.【原文：Raymond James Financial Inc. is the latest firm to snap up executives from Citigroup Inc.’s shuttering municipal-bond division.】

item.title: 巴西种植者破产，70 亿美元农业信贷热潮受挫
item.description: 农业强国巴西正在收获一个又一个丰收。然而，种植者却以惊人的速度破产，这给这个快速增长的 70 亿美元农业企业融资市场的投资者带来了打击。【原文：Agricultural powerhouse Brazil is harvesting one bumper crop after another. Yet, growers are going bankrupt at an alarming rate, dealing a blow to investors in the fast-growing $7 billion market for agribusiness funding.】

item.title: 中国开发商万科被穆迪降至 "垃圾 "级
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）取消了国家支持的开发商中国万科股份有限公司（China Vanke Co.【原文：Moody’s Ratings stripped state-backed developer China Vanke Co. of investment-grade credit rating and warned of potential further cuts, predicting credit metrics and liquidity will weaken because of falling home sales and funding uncertainties.】

item.title: 在线投资平台 Webull 新增期货和商品交易功能
item.description: Webull Financial 现在提供期货和大宗商品交易，因为投资者正在寻找更多的方法，在不拥有相关资产的情况下对冲价格变动。【原文：Webull Financial is now offering futures and commodities trading as investors look for more ways to hedge price moves without owning an underlying asset.】

item.title: Balyasny 在对冲基金重组中聘用投资组合经理
item.description: 作为对冲基金股票交易业务更广泛重组的一部分，Balyasny 资产管理公司聘请了几位投资组合经理。【原文：Balyasny Asset Management has hired several portfolio managers as part of a broader restructuring of the hedge fund’s equity trading businesses.】

item.title: 阿美石油公司的千亿美元派息令投资者苦苦寻找答案
item.description:
在公司出售股份之前，对更高回报的承诺和对政府控制权的担忧引发了质疑。【原文：

The promise of higher returns and concerns about government control pose questions ahead of the company’s share sale. 

】

item.title: Signa Prime 即将与 Schoeller 集团达成奥地利资产出售协议
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Signa 旗舰地产部门即将达成协议，向德国 Schoeller 集团出售奥地利的豪华资产组合。【原文：Signa’s flagship property unit is close to an agreement to sell a portfolio of luxury Austrian assets to Germany’s Schoeller Group, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 汽车贷款投诉冲击银行，而银行甚至不属于英国评论网
item.description: 一家次级贷款机构因客户对汽车贷款的投诉激增而受到打击；尽管该银行表示，它并不是英国正在进行的汽车贷款行为审查的对象。【原文：A subprime lender has been hit by a spike in customer complaints over car loans — even though the bank said it’s not a subject of the ongoing UK review into auto lending practices.】

item.title: 辛杜贾律师称人口贩运起诉书存在缺陷
item.description: 亿万富翁欣杜贾家族的成员因虐待其家政人员而被控贩卖人口，他们说瑞士对他们的起诉书漏洞百出，必须退回检察官重新审查。【原文：Members of the billionaire Hinduja family charged with human trafficking over the mistreatment of their domestic staff said that the Swiss indictment against them is deeply flawed and must be sent back to prosecutors for re-examination.】

item.title: 银行家富豪的律师被指对其现金审查过于客气
item.description: 一家顶级律师事务所被指控违反了英国的洗钱规定，因为该事务所过于礼貌，没有询问一位来自前苏联共和国、与政治有关联的银行家是如何获得现金的。【原文：A top law firm is accused of breaking UK money-laundering rules by being too polite to ask a politically connected banker from a former Soviet republic how he got his cash.】

item.title: 美国之行凸显制裁困境，德国莱弗森银行股价暴跌
item.description: 就在 Raiffeisen Bank International AG 试图敲定一项涉及其俄罗斯部门的复杂交易时，该奥地利贷款机构受到了一名美国高级制裁官员的访问，此后其在维也纳的股价最高下跌了 12%。【原文：Shares of Raiffeisen Bank International AG fell as much as 12% in Vienna after the Austrian lender was visited by a senior US sanctions official just as it seeks to finalize a complex deal involving its Russian unit.】

item.title: EQT 将以 55 亿美元收购山谷管道所有者
item.description: 美国最大的天然气生产商 EQT 公司同意以约 55 亿美元的股票回购其前子公司 Equitrans Midstream Corp.【原文：EQT Corp., the largest US natural gas producer, agreed to buy back its former unit Equitrans Midstream Corp. for about $5.5 billion in stock in the latest in a flurry of deals in the oil and gas pipeline industry.】

item.title: 联合信贷银行的尼尔森称，即使美联储不降息，欧洲央行也能降息
item.description: 2022年12月15日星期四，一艘煤炭驳船沿美因河驶过位于德国法兰克福的欧洲中央银行（ECB）总部。欧洲央行管理委员会成员马迪斯-穆勒（Madis Muller）表示，由于经济放缓不足以按需抑制通胀，利率可能会高于市场预期水平。摄影师：亚历克斯-克劳斯/布鲁姆伯格【原文：A coal barge travels along the River Main past the European Central Bank (ECB) headquarters in Frankfurt, Germany, on Thursday, Dec. 15, 2022. ECB Governing Council member Madis Muller said interest rates will likely rise above levels anticipated by markets as the economic slowdown isn't enough to curb inflation as needed. Photographer: Alex Kraus/Bloomberg】

item.title: 多诺霍说：欧盟国防短期内将由本国提供资金
item.description: 2024 年 2 月 23 日星期五，比利时根特，欧元集团主席帕夏尔-多诺霍在欧盟（EU）经济和财政部长非正式会议的新闻发布会上。在乌克兰战争即将进入第三个年头之际，欧盟财政部长们正试图找出如何为增加的国防开支需求提供资金。摄影师：Simon Wohlfahrt/Bloomberg【原文：Paschal Donohoe, president of Eurogroup, during a news conference at an informal meeting of European Union (EU) economic and financial affairs ministers in Ghent, Belgium, on Friday, Feb. 23, 2024. European Union finance chiefs are trying to figure out how to fund increased spending needs for defense as the war in Ukraine is about to enter its third year. Photographer: Simon Wohlfahrt/Bloomberg】

item.title: 欧元集团多诺霍表示有信心周一达成 CMU 协议
item.description: 欧元集团主席帕夏尔-多诺霍（Paschal Donohoe）表示，他确信欧洲财政首脑将在周一的会议上就一个广泛的路线图达成协议，以推动该集团迈向资本市场联盟。【原文：Eurogroup President Paschal Donohoe said he’s sure European finance chief will reach an agreement on a broad roadmap to take the bloc toward a capital markets union at their Monday meeting.】

item.title: 银行对中国万科贷款条件持反对意见，成为国家支持的障碍
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国万科股份有限公司（China Vanke Co.，简称 "万科"）在一笔新的 45 亿港元（约合 5.75 亿美元）离岸贷款上正面临来自国内两家最大银行的阻力，这是对国家支持这家资金短缺的房地产巨头的一次重大考验。【原文：China Vanke Co. is facing resistance from the nation’s two largest banks on a new HK$4.5 billion ($575 million) offshore loan, according to people familiar with the matter, in a major test of state support for the cash-strapped real-estate giant.】

item.title: 伦敦证券交易所将接受比特币和以太坊 ETN 的申请
item.description: 伦敦证券交易所表示，将开始接受以比特币和以太币为支撑的交易所交易票据的入市申请，为专业投资者投资该资产类别开辟了另一条途径。【原文：The London Stock Exchange said it will start accepting applications for the admission of exchange traded notes backed by Bitcoin and Ether, opening another avenue for professional investors to invest in the asset class.】

item.title: 英国会计监管机构正在洽谈迁出伦敦金融城事宜
item.description: 英国会计监管机构财务报告委员会正在商谈年底前将其总部迁出伦敦金融城的事宜。【原文：The Financial Reporting Council, UK’s accounting watchdog, is in talks to move its headquarters out of the City of London by the end of the year.】

item.title: 后起之秀挑战现代投资的基础
item.description:
一位诺贝尔奖获得者的理论支持押注更便宜的股票，并为基金经理们树立了一个基准。但数字在不断变化。这有多重要？【原文：

A Nobel laureate’s theory supports betting on cheaper stocks and sets a benchmark for money managers. But the numbers keep changing. How much does it matter?

】

item.title: 香港为《保安条例草案》中的外来干涉指控辩护
item.description: 香港最高安全官员试图向立法者保证，香港金融中心的商业活动不会受到政府正在快速推进的安全立法中新增的外部干扰罪的影响。【原文：Hong Kong’s top security official sought to reassure lawmakers that business activities in the finance hub won’t be affected by new external interference offenses included in security legislation being fast-tracked by the government.】

item.title: 多诺霍期待保加利亚 2025 年加入欧元区
埃及股市在货币贬值冲击后恢复强劲涨势
item.description: 在北非国家货币贬值并获得新的资金以缓解经济压力之后，埃及股市恢复了世界股市的涨势。【原文：Egyptian stocks resumed a world-beating stock rally after the North African nation devalued its currency and secured fresh funding to ease pressure on its economy.】

item.title: 赞比亚债券持有人很快将得到可比性问题的答案
item.description: 赞比亚官方债权人委员会可能很快就会回答一个关键问题，这个问题几乎使赞比亚三年来的债务重组努力付诸东流：与债券持有人达成的类似协议应该是什么样的？【原文：Zambia’s official creditor committee could soon answer the critical question that almost sunk its three-year debt restructuring efforts: What should a comparable deal with bondholders look like?】

item.title: 中国成长股在 CATL 和能源股的提振下大涨
item.description: 受电池和可再生能源行业相关股票反弹的提振，追踪中国成长股的指数跳涨。【原文：A gauge tracking Chinese growth stocks jumped, boosted by a rally in shares related to the battery and renewable energy sectors.】

item.title: 中国重大立法会议的五个重要启示
item.description: 在习近平主席日益集权的同时，中国希望避免经济增长放缓，并向技术创新驱动的经济转型。这是本月召开的全国人民代表大会给我们的启示，这是一年一度的立法会议，中国的橡皮图章议会在会上批准执政的共产党的政策。以下是此次会议对未来一年中国经济和政治走向的简要介绍。【原文：China wants to avoid a slowdown in growth and transition its economy to one driven by technological innovation, all as President Xi Jinping increasingly centralizes power. That’s the takeaway from this month’s National People’s Congress, the annual legislative gathering where China’s rubber-stamp parliament approves policies from the ruling Communist Party. Here’s a rundown of what the event revealed about the nation’s economic and political direction in year ahead.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡齐米尔倾向于 6 月减息，因为通胀回落依然脆弱
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员彼得-卡齐米尔（Peter Kazimir）认为，欧洲中央银行不应该在 6 月份之前降低利率，因为官员们需要更多的数据来确定通货膨胀已经得到控制。【原文：The European Central Bank shouldn’t lower interest rates before June as officials need more data to be sure that inflation has been tamed, according to Governing Council member Peter Kazimir.】

item.title: 黑胶唱片阔别 32 年后重返英国通胀篮子
item.description: 在黑胶唱片大受欢迎之后，32 年来黑胶唱片将首次回到英国的通胀购物篮中，而随着大流行病逐渐淡出英国人的购物习惯，洗手液也被淘汰出局。【原文：Vinyl records will return to the UK inflation basket for the first time in 32 years after a surge in their popularity, while hand sanitizer is out as the pandemic fades from the nation’s shopping habits.】
